text: hi and welcome to our taboo series in
this series you're going to be learning
swear words these are words that are not
nice they're really bad and they're
really really rude so you need to be
careful where you say them it's better
if you don't say them at all but you're
going to be hearing them on TV in movies
and from English speakers so we want you
to be able to understand them if you
want to use them please be careful where
you use them you want to use it around
people who aren't going to become
offended these words can make people
upset or uncomfortable so please use
them only around people who you trust or
at home by yourself do not use them
around your parents do not use them at
work and do not use them around children
if you are somebody who doesn't like
swear words or you find them rude or
offensive then this series is probably
not for you if you do want to learn
these words then keep watching I hope
you learned something
